title: Animated Video Software Focusky Now Has More Than 400,000 Downloads
text:
For every product/service to be successful, the innovative approach and high quality are the two most important parameters. In the field of animated video software also, the parameters remain the same. There are quite a number of companies in the market that are providing such software services to their clients. But to make a strong client base with its consistent high quality and continuous innovative additions is a task that not many can perform successfully. But “Focusky” has succeeded in doing so and as a result, their loyal users have helped them in reaching a milestone of 400,000 downloads of the software worldwide.
Reportedly, this animated video software is made available online as well as in a desktop version. Though both of the versions are being highly acclaimed for their quality, but with more powerful editing functions available in the desktop edition, the users have downloaded the software in huge numbers. Since this animated video software is available for both, Windows and Mac platforms, this flexibility has helped the wide section of users to benefit from it.
Looking at the features that the software provides, some of which are the firsts by anyone, the success of this animated video software is not a surprise. Loaded with features like unlimited zoom and pan effect, 3D zoom and video backgrounds, built-in tools for animation and for providing a dynamic look, this software provides unlimited options to create an amazing animated video. The availability of easy animation tools help users in making a professional animated explainer video without being an expert in animations. Since the desktop edition has powerful editing functions which helps in including perfect key frames, length of the different animations, beautiful transitions, amazing rotations etc, the software has been downloaded by the users in abundance.
Jason Chen, President- Focusky, has termed this milestone as a success of the efforts that the whole Focusky team has put in coming up with this software. Their hard work and consistent push towards bettering themselves day by day has made this all possible. A highly satisfied client base of 30000+ companies is a testimony of their hard work being turned into a huge success. Committed towards continuous improvements, Focusky is all set to touch new heights of success.
For more information, go to http://focusky.com .
